EmailTemplate.name: BITC Lloyds CV workshop invite 13.4.16
EmailTemplate.subject: CV and Interview skills workshop with Lloyds Bank 13 April BOOK NOW
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
On 13 April from 16:00 - 18:00 we will be Joined by James Harvey from Lloyds Banking group for an amazing workshop on CV writing and Interview skills.
This workshop will be focusing on:
How you can differentiate yourself from others (using the job profile to adjust your cv) What your CV should or should not have and how long or short should it be Should you put all your grades on it What are your skills for the job and how to translate this onto paper
Find out from a top employer exactly what they are looking for to make sure your CV is the best it can be!
Now that you have been invited to interview on the back of an excellent CV, we shall try to understand how to bring your CV to life with examples. The major interview do's and dont's, and great tips like how the interview starts before you even sit down and how to manage your body language.
This will be an amazing opportunity for everyone preparing for job interviews and for university applications and interviews.
WHEN Wednesday, 13 April 2016 from 16:00 to 18:00 (BST)
WHERE Courtyard 2 - Highgate Studios 53-79 Highgate Road, London NW5 1TL, United Kingdom
Space is limited so please book NOW here to ensure your place on this workshop!
https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/cv-and-interview-skills-workshop-with-lloyds-banking-group-tickets-24084914628
Any questions please don't hesitate to ask,
Best wishes,
Ed
